update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [Selec Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/selec_meter.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The address of the sensor if multiple sensors are attached to the same UART bus. You will need to set the address of each device manually. Defaults to `1`.

*See also: [Selec Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/selec_meter.html#configuration-variables)*
